response:

* call you names - karen
* give you angry looks - eric
* put down your friends - eric
* say things to scare you - karen
* make you do something embarrassing - eric
* encourage you to open up - me (your loving wife)
* open to your ideas - eric
* excited to see you - karen
* listen attentively to you - me (your loving wife)
